amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funding for the issuance of visas into the United States to anyone who violates child abduction provisions of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being available to be used in violation of section 212(a)(10)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Ose.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 418).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
